Warsaw/ Sofia: Europe rolled out a huge COVID-19 vaccination drive on Sunday to try to rein in the coronavirus … [+4379 chars]

articles.title: US Doctor Suffers Allergic Reaction to Moderna's Coronavirus Vaccine - News18
articles.description: A Boston physician said he developed a severe allergic reaction minutes after receiving Moderna’s coronavirus vaccine Thursday, in the first week of the nationwide rollout for the company’s shots.
articles.content: A Boston physician said he developed a severe allergic reaction minutes after receiving Modernas coronavirus vaccine Thursday, in the first week of the nationwide rollout for the companys shots.
